If all lives matter went without saying, it would be superfluous to remind people that black lives matter, because no sensible person would deny that black lives be lives.


Exactly lol that's why i enjoy the irony of 'all lives matter' quite A LOT to be honest.

it's not American people, but some, and indeed many, American people. Thank you.


You're absolutely right. Perhaps I exaggerated a little there. Many people are outrageous after seeing that video, but many are not. 一个健康的社会不应该只有一种声音的嘛. ;)

Majority Americans if feel no anger, do support the protest, and that's good enough to start a conversation, an initiative. And it will lead to some changes down the road you know.

https://www.forbes.com/sites/lisettevoytko/2020/06/09/74-of-americans-support-george-floyd-protests-majority-disapprove-of-trumps-handling/#433d54a7557c

And sadly 回来说品葱的存在机缘，这正是期待自由的中国人苦苦寻求的不是吗？在一个具有集体反思能力的社会，善良才会有存在的希望。
